name: Blocks and Beats
description:
Classic block puzzle gameplay. Reactive, synesthetic, pulsing effects that react as you clear line after line. Blocks with a healthy serving of beats!

Features:

  • Classic block puzzle gameplay
  • Reactive, evolving, synesthetic music and graphics across 3 levels

PHOTOSENSITIVITY WARNING: Contains flashing colors and pulsing lights. 


Blocks and Beats is made by:

  • Mark Pil - Code / Sounds / Art
  • Jeff Ramos - Sounds / Art
  • fós- Sounds
